let's hurry up and go."},{"lineNumber":26925,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつまでもこんな狭い所に留まっていられるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"We can't stay in such a cramped place room,"},{"lineNumber":26929,"originalJapaneseLine":"王子東芝は、今日も無聊を託っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Prince Toshiba was once again passing the time in boredom today."},{"lineNumber":26930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日で……何日目だろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder... how many days has it been now?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレルギー超大国と同じ旗を仰ぐことはできん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I cannot raise the same flag as the allergy superpower."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーーーーっ！？　また…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehhhhh!? Again..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ご子息の話、ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You're talking about your son?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「存じておったか。身内の恥になるが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You knew? It's a shame for the family, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よりによって、満鉄王の娘と通じるとは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of all people, he's involved with the daughter of the Mantetsu King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、やっぱり……仲が悪いんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, so after all... do they not get along?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元々、満鉄王とは反りが合わぬ。。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, he did not see eye to eye with the Mantetsu King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……だが、直接的には、例の話が発覚した直後の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...However, directly, it was right after that incident came to light."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラクリカップよ。奴め、やらかしおった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the Karakuri Cup. That fool really messed up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やらかし、って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Messed up, you say..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我がアニャガス王国を公然と侮辱するような事を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He publicly insulted our Anyagas Kingdom."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いおってな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said such things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかげで、国民感情は最悪よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to that, the public sentiment is at its worst."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あちゃー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それから、両国の仲はどんどん悪化した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, the relations between the two countries deteriorated rapidly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラクリカップを取りやめてこそおらぬが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They haven't canceled the Karakuri Cup yet, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 競技も応援も敵意剥き出しだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both the competition and support are full of hostility."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、両王家の軋轢だけではなく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, it's not just the friction between the two royal families..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「両国がこのまま加わっても、不和は避けられまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If both countries join as they are, discord is unavoidable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無用な混乱を招くだけじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It will only cause unnecessary chaos."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのう……その、王子様は今、どこに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... where is the prince right now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこぞへ飛び出そうとしたのでな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He tried to run off somewhere."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れで謹慎させておる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's under house arrest at a separate residence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、あの放蕩者め…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, that prodigal..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女に興味が無いのかと思っておったのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought he had no interest in women, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、こんな事に…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never imagined it would come to this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三菱は重苦しく溜息をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mitsubishi sighed heavily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は三菱王との会見を終え、外に出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others finished their meeting with King Mitsubishi and went outside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「三菱の王様も、大変そうでしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "King Mitsubishi seemed to be having a hard time too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What shall we do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両国とも、良くない関係のようですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems both countries have a poor relationship."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……」
「東芝王子を助けてあげましょ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's help Prince Toshiba!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国に引き裂かれた二人なんて、かわいそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's sad for two people torn apart by their countries."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「めんどくさいなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a pain..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちかだけでもいいんじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wouldn't it be fine to choose just one?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだそんな事言ってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're still saying that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「両国間のトラブルを解決しておけば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we resolve the troubles between the two countries,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得られる戦力はより大きいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "the strength we gain will be greater."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですよ。助けてあげましょう、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. Let's help him, Lord Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、うるさいな。行けばいいんだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, fine, you’re noisy. I'll go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとうございます！　ランス様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you! Lord Lance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「軟禁場所、すぐに調べてくるわね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll immediately check the confinement location!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うちもちょちょいっと知り合いに当たってみるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll quickly ask around among my acquaintances as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やる気出しやがって、まったく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Getting all motivated, geez..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で……その答えが、この狭苦しい枝道か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So... the answer is this cramped side path."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、身を屈めないと通れない大きさの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others were proceeding single-file through a cave so small they had to crouch to pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞穴を、一列縦隊で進んでいた。
「この道を進んでいけば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we continue down this path,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王子のいる別荘の裏手に出るの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'll come out at the back of the villa where the prince is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターも出るらしいけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I heard monsters also appear around there though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこからなら、こっそり入れる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can we sneak in from there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぶん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Probably."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、さっさといくぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, let's hurry up and go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつまでもこんな狭い所に留まっていられるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't stay in such a cramped place forever."
"Sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――アニャガス王国、離宮。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- Anyagas Kingdom, the detached palace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡素な作りの一室で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a simply constructed room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王子東芝は、今日も無聊を託っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prince Toshiba was once again passing the time in boredom today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日で……何日目だろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder... how many days has it been now?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

today."},{"lineNumber":26930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日で……何日目だろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder... how many days has it been now?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレルギー超大国と同じ旗を仰ぐことはできん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I cannot raise the same flag as the allergy superpower."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーーーーっ！？　また…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehhhhh!? Again..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ご子息の話、ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You're talking about your son?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「存じておったか。身内の恥になるが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You knew? It's a shame for the family, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よりによって、満鉄王の娘と通じるとは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of all people, he's involved with the daughter of the Mantetsu King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、やっぱり……仲が悪いんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, so after all... do they not get along?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元々、満鉄王とは反りが合わぬ。。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, he did not see eye to eye with the Mantetsu King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……だが、直接的には、例の話が発覚した直後の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...However, directly, it was right after that incident came to light."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラクリカップよ。奴め、やらかしおった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the Karakuri Cup. That fool really messed up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やらかし、って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Messed up, you say..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我がアニャガス王国を公然と侮辱するような事を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He publicly insulted our Anyagas Kingdom."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いおってな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said such things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかげで、国民感情は最悪よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to that, the public sentiment is at its worst."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あちゃー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それから、両国の仲はどんどん悪化した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, the relations between the two countries deteriorated rapidly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラクリカップを取りやめてこそおらぬが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They haven't canceled the Karakuri Cup yet, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 競技も応援も敵意剥き出しだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both the competition and support are full of hostility."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、両王家の軋轢だけではなく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, it's not just the friction between the two royal families..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「両国がこのまま加わっても、不和は避けられまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If both countries join as they are, discord is unavoidable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無用な混乱を招くだけじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It will only cause unnecessary chaos."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのう……その、王子様は今、どこに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... where is the prince right now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこぞへ飛び出そうとしたのでな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He tried to run off somewhere."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れで謹慎させておる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's under house arrest at a separate residence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、あの放蕩者め…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, that prodigal..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女に興味が無いのかと思っておったのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought he had no interest in women, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、こんな事に…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never imagined it would come to this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三菱は重苦しく溜息をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mitsubishi sighed heavily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は三菱王との会見を終え、外に出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others finished their meeting with King Mitsubishi and went outside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「三菱の王様も、大変そうでしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "King Mitsubishi seemed to be having a hard time too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What shall we do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両国とも、良くない関係のようですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems both countries have a poor relationship."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……」
「東芝王子を助けてあげましょ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's help Prince Toshiba!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国に引き裂かれた二人なんて、かわいそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's sad for two people torn apart by their countries."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「めんどくさいなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a pain..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちかだけでもいいんじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wouldn't it be fine to choose just one?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだそんな事言ってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're still saying that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「両国間のトラブルを解決しておけば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we resolve the troubles between the two countries,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得られる戦力はより大きいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "the strength we gain will be greater."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですよ。助けてあげましょう、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. Let's help him, Lord Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、うるさいな。行けばいいんだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, fine, you’re noisy. I'll go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとうございます！　ランス様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you! Lord Lance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「軟禁場所、すぐに調べてくるわね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll immediately check the confinement location!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うちもちょちょいっと知り合いに当たってみるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll quickly ask around among my acquaintances as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やる気出しやがって、まったく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Getting all motivated, geez..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で……その答えが、この狭苦しい枝道か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So... the answer is this cramped side path."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、身を屈めないと通れない大きさの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others were proceeding single-file through a cave so small they had to crouch to pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞穴を、一列縦隊で進んでいた。
「この道を進んでいけば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we continue down this path,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王子のいる別荘の裏手に出るの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'll come out at the back of the villa where the prince is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターも出るらしいけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I heard monsters also appear around there though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこからなら、こっそり入れる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can we sneak in from there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぶん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Probably."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、さっさといくぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, let's hurry up and go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつまでもこんな狭い所に留まっていられるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't stay in such a cramped place forever."
"Sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――アニャガス王国、離宮。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- Anyagas Kingdom, the detached palace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡素な作りの一室で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a simply constructed room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王子東芝は、今日も無聊を託っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prince Toshiba was once again passing the time in boredom today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日で……何日目だろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder... how many days has it been now?"
